entry.title: Receiving via unpublished channels
entry.summary: In this context, ZmnSCPxj greets Olauluwa and provides information about the Ptarmigan Lightning Network project from Nayuta Ueno/Nayutaco. The project can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/nayutaco/ptarmigan. The name of the daemon associated with the project is ucoind, while the CLI is ucoincli.
